response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $15,000, but I am willing to consider a fair offer. Given the exclusivity and quality of this product, I propose a starting price of $20,000. I look forward to discussing this further and understanding what value you see in this product. Let's make this a win-win proposition for both of us.", "product_price": 20000}
